column2: Jaidlin, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: It worried me when they told me it could affect my liver long term. Now they are putting a warning lable on it for breathing issues.  It works for me.  If it isn't working for you, talk to your doctor.  I had to take it 3x daily mixed with .5 mg of clonopin to take care of my problems.  I couldn't keep weight on and everything I ate came right back out and in severe pain (passed out, rushed to the hospital). When I tried to stop, I spasm so badly food either backs up now or I am back to not being able to walk with out losing everything I drink and eat.  It beat having to go for surgery. I just hope the long term affects aren't going to cause other more serious issues.
